WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
BRAZIL-SOUTHEAST COAST.
DNC 01.
1. SURVEY OPERATIONS IN PROGRESS UNTIL 17 DEC
   BY M/V OCEANIC SIRIUS TOWING 12 11112 METER
   LONG CABLES IN AREA BOUND BY
   26-47.05S 042-43.42W, 24-18.20S 042-40.03W,
   24-18.47S 042-06.37W, 24-06.07S 042-06.27W,
   23-31.32S 040-59.00W, 22-50.20S 039-56.07W,
   22-35.03S 037-41.02W, 26-34.15S 037-35.12W.
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 2973/21.
3. CANCEL THIS MSG 18 DEC 21.
